The '''Mountains of Moria''' were [[Celebdil]], [[Caradhras]] and [[Fanuidhol]], beneath which [[Moria|Khazad-d√ªm]] was delved by the [[Dwarves]].<ref>{{FR|II3}}</ref> The main body of their city (later called [[Moria]]) seems to have been beneath [[Celebdil]], which they called '''Zirakzigil''', and which was crowned by [[Durin's Tower]].<ref>{{TT|III5}}</ref>
